verses.text: \w Fools|strong="H5036"\w* say \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H6213"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, “There \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* God.” Vile, hateful \w their|strong="H6213"\w* \w life|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w*; \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H2896"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w From|strong="H5921"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w looks|strong="H7200"\w* \w out|strong="H8259"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* humans, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w if|strong="H7200"\w* \w any|strong="H3426"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w care|strong="H1875"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1571"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* bad, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* taint \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w on|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*; \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w no|strong="H6213"\w*, \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Have|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w learned|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* lesson, \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* evil? \w Who|strong="H3605"\w* ate \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, eating, devouring, \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w calling|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Sore \w afraid|strong="H6342"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H6662"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* God \w is|strong="H6662"\w* \w among|strong="H1755"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* \w are|strong="H6662"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*,

\w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* mock \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w plans|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w*.

If only \w help|strong="H3444"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*! \w When|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w brings|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w change|strong="H7725"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w fortune|strong="H7622"\w*, \w how|strong="H4310"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w how|strong="H4310"\w* \w joyful|strong="H1523"\w*!
